audio_item.dc.title: Sound Recording - [Letter from Robert Shepard:] March 11, 1969 - 1969 March 11
audio_item.dc.contributor.author: Shepard, Robert J.
audio_item.dc.rights.access: This material is available for research only in the Reading Room of the Bentley Historical Library at the University of Michigan (Ann Arbor, MI).

audio_item.dc.description: Content note: The sound recording(s) associated with this repository item derive from a single audio reel tape. A single tape may yield multiple audio files if there were variations in tape stock, speed, or channels (i.e. stereo or mono). For more information see http://deepblue.lib.umich.edu/handle/2027.42/108126.
audio_item.dc.abstract: [Side 1] : [Part 1] : Recorded letters sent home by Shepard while stationed in Vietnam, 1968-1969. Tape box notes that bombs can be heard in the background.Caption: Hear bombs in background 85 Days to Go

[Side 2] : [Part 2] : Recorded letters sent home by Shepard while stationed in Vietnam, 1968-1969. Tape box notes that bombs can be heard in the background. References a B-52 bombing strike occurring at the time.Caption: Hear bombs in background 85 Days to Go
